channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' gains new Florida contestant…
item.description: "Bachelor in Paradise"is looking more and more like Peacock's hit reality show "Love Island USA" every week. Last night's new episode, which ended on a rose ceremony cliffhanger, brought a big twist for Bachelor Nation.

item.title: Trump vs. windmills: Do wind turbines kill birds? Are…
item.description: During a press conference in Scotland July 27 to announcea trade dealwith the European Union, President Donald Trump veered unprompted into a familiar rant against windfarms and wind turbines and told European countries to get rid of theirs.

item.title: Where is Allegiant's new destination from SRQ this fall?
item.description: The Sarasota Bradenton International Airport announced a new Allegiant flight Tuesday, connecting Sarasota and Toledo, Ohio, with one-way fares as low as $59. The route is set to begin flying Nov. 20.
